extension.summary: Confluence Vertical Home skin by Jezz_X.
extension.description: This is the default Confluence skin before it changed to a Horizontal home menu inbetween dharma and eden versions of XBMC. Confluence is the default skin for XBMC 9.11 and above. It is a combination of concepts from many popular skins, and attempts to embrace and integrate their good ideas into a skin that should be easy for first time XBMC users to understand and use.
